name: World Sports Competition
overview: Top Athletes Battle for Glory! You create an athlete who runs, jumps, and throws! Aim for the world record...and never give up! With 18 events to choose from... With 6 categories, and a total of 18 exciting events, you'll have a wide choice to train for. Then go on to challenge Olympic Mode in your chose event. you too can be a world record holder! Excitement x 5! Exciting alone, unbelievable with friends! Up to five players can compete at once, for some serious adrenalin action!
